metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6727 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Special:DeletedContributions page in MediaWiki before 1.23.10, 1.24.x before 1.24.3, and 1.25.x before 1.25.2 allows remote attackers to determine if an IP is autoblocked via the "Change block" text.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6727` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
